attributes.action: Regulate Generative AI to make online spaces safer and to protect our creativity
attributes.additional_details:
Over the past few years we have seen an uprise in AI generated media, this harms the safety of women & girls online, posed a threat to our creative media industry and has been a big thorn in the side of our cyber security.

Recently, Grok has mass produced CSAM (Child Sexual Abuse Material). AI generated film trailers have appeared on social media misleading us & the elderly are falling victim to AI scams, unregulated generative AI is a threat to our integrity as a nation and our culture.
attributes.background: Put region wide regulations/blocks on Generative AI platforms such as Craiyon, Grok and ChatGPT amongst others, making it harder to access, generate or create source code for misleading, harmful, exploitative and perverted images, sounds and videos.

rejection.details:
We are not sure what kind of regulations you would like to see introduced. 

We currently have quite a lot of petitions open on AI use of images and impact on creativity, which you may wish to sign: 

Ban the use of AI for image, video and audio creation
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751635

Ban training generative AI with creative works without artists' consent
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/748596

Ban the use of AI generating the arts
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/746339

And all AI-related petitions are here:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions?state=open&q=AI
